subject: Web3
title: Counterfeit Collections
description: A short lesson to help you apply Counterfeit Collections.

hook.text: Scammers created fake versions of popular NFT collections with slightly altered names and similar art.

buildup.text: A buyer searching for 'Bored Ape Yacht Club' might find 'Bored Ape Yatch Club' â€” misspelled but visually identical.

discovery.text: Newcomers fell for it regularly. They bought worthless counterfeits thinking they'd snagged a deal.

twist.text: Verification badges helped but weren't foolproof. Scammers even faked the badges in screenshots.

climax.text: In a trustless system, trust still matters. Buyers must verify contract addresses, not just visual appearances.

punchline.text: Even in a system built on trust, fakes thrive.

quiz.question: How did scammers create counterfeit NFT collections?
options: Creating fake collections with similar names and art
